Question: Where can user check the NEFT / Enrollment status.
Answers: 1. On Rewards Portal : For Single customer user can refer Single Customer Information option available in Master Menu. For Multiple customer, user can refer Secondary customer Master option available under Master Menu.
2. In Mobile Application : User can refer Single Customer information available under main menu.

Question: Where can user check the Customer wise Turnover
Answers: 1. User can refer Customer wise Secondary Turnover system path is as below :
MIS Report >> Turnover Report >> Customer wise Secondary Turnover For Part wise data : MIS Report >> Turnover Report >> Data Sales by BMD

Question: Where can we check BRO Eligible customers
Answers: User can refer BRO Monthly Incentive Report by referring below path :
1. MIS Report >> Incentive 2020 >> BRO Incentive 2020 >> BRO Monthly Incentive 2020 (by Selecting Incentive Amount >0)
2. MIS Report >> BRO >> BMD BRO Dashboard

Question: Is there any provision to check the Part wise Order Vs. Supply
Answers: User can refer Submitted Offer Order Settlement Report by referring below path : MIS Report >> BRO >> Submitted Offer Order Settlement
